title: Bitcoin in the current Macro Landscape: Jon Cheeseman from FTX
description:
Blockware Lead Insights Analyst Will Clemente speaks with Head of OTC at FTX Jon Cheeseman, to discuss Bitcoin and its role in the current macro landscape.   

Follow Jon at twitter.com/ftx_access
dc:creator: Joe Burnett
